metadata.name: Less Finder
metadata.description-es: Un mod que te permite realizar busquedas de cuentas, agregar amigos e inspeccionar sus cuentas
metadata.description-en: A mod that allows you to search for accounts, add friends, and inspect their accounts

content:
A mod that allows you to search for friends and player accounts, making it easy to check your opponents’ profiles before fighting them.

## Features
- Search for servers  
- Add friends  
- Inspect player profiles  
- Search accounts by V2, ID, and PB  
- Advanced search (works even with partial or unknown data (still, try to be specific, you will only be able to see a maximum of 200 accounts))
- Preferences  
  - Language Support: Spanish, English, Portuguese, Russian, Hindi, Malayalam, Indonesian  
  - Color themes  
- View friends who are online  
  - *Note: You need to search for servers to see where your friends are playing, and whether there is available space on their server*  
- View player accounts in-game through the party window  
- Copy player information to the clipboard  

## Acknowledgements and More

This is the first official mod I’ve released. I took code and feature references from other mods. I also credited the other mods I used as examples in the mod’s credits.

I’m aware that it has several issues, mainly related to dynamically changing colors. I’m open to fixes and suggestions via DM. I hope you enjoy it—and by the way, thanks to <@1229289799857344588>  for making the video about this.
